channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: New Era Reveals 2024 NBA Draft Hats
item.description: With less than two weeks until the 2024 NBA Draft, New Era has released the hats that all 30 teams will present on stage to their first-round picks.

item.title: R&B Singer Angela Bofill Dead at 70 in California
item.description: Angela Bofill – the R&B vocalist best known for her songs, "I Try" and "Angel of the Night," has died. Bofill passed away at her daughter's home in Vallejo, California. Her cause of death was not disclosed, but she had previous health issues.…

item.title: Premier League’s Everton FC Leaves Hummel, Signs Kit ‘Landmark’ Deal With Castore
item.description: British sportswear brand also becomes first founding partner of Everton's new stadium, slated to open in time for the 2024-25 Premier League season

item.title: Bill Maher Says Father's Day Should Be a Time Dad's Rethink How They Raise Kids
item.description: Father's Day should be a time to rethink parenting so kids aren't running the show at home ... so grouses Bill Maher! The "Real Time" host bore in on the whole "Gentle Parenting" movement, where parents treat kids like right-thinking adults. Turns…

item.title: Bowling Green Falcons Unveil New Throwback-Inspired Football Uniforms
item.description: Bowling Green recently unveiled mockups of three new uniforms for this season that are reminiscent of the Falcons' look during the 1980s and 1990s.

item.title: Taylor Swift Performs Calvin Harris, Rihanna's 'This Is What You Came For'
item.description: Taylor Swift fans got quite the treat Friday in Liverpool ... when she played an acoustic version of Ex Calvin Harris and Rihanna's hit, "This Is What You Came For." It was her first "Eras" tour surprise song of the night, and Tay teased it saying,…

item.title: Utah Hockey Club Unveils Logos, Uniforms, Colours, and Name for 2024-25
item.description: It’s officially official: Utah has an NHL team… and a name, logo, colours, and uniform (even if those last four are just temporary). Today, the National Hockey League made it official by announcing the Utah Hockey Club would join the league in time for the 2024-25 season, absorbing the roster,

item.title: O.J. Simpson May Have Gone to Murder Scene In Someone Else's Ford Bronco
item.description: O.J. Simpson went to ex-wife Nicole Brown Simpson's condo the night of the murders in a Ford Bronco, but there's evidence that the Bronco wasn't his. TMZ has a new documentary on Tubi -- 'O.J. How He Really Did It' -- in which Harvey Levin, then a…

item.title: Rising Tides: Halifax NSL Club Unveils Name, Crest
item.description: Nova Scotia-based club is third of Northern Super League's six teams for inaugural season in 2025 to unveil their visual identity system

item.title: Bill Belichick Dating 24-Year-Old Ex-Cheerleader Jordon Hudson
item.description: Bill Belichick has a new love interest in his life ... TMZ Sports has learned he's dating 24-year-old former competitive cheerleader Jordon Hudson. Sources close to the situation tell us the two have been romantic for a while now -- becoming an…
